General.Name: DCX Systems Limited
General.Description: DCX Systems Limited manufactures and sells defense electronic systems and cable harnesses in India and internationally. It provides cable and harness assemblies, fine wire cable assemblies, flex flat cable assemblies, EMI shield cable harness products, wired enclosures, backplane assemblies, diagnostic test sets, conduit assemblies, and special/customized connectors. It also offers aerospace, defense, and industrial automation equipment, subsystem assembly, integration, and testing services, as well as kitting services. DCX Systems Limited was formerly known as DCX Cable Assemblies Pvt. Ltd. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Bengaluru, India.
